description.displayText: Nona cared for my Mother for over four yrs.She was an excellent caretaker. She was always dependable & on time. She showed excellent skills. My Mother was extremely happy with Nona's care. My Mother was almost total care. She required baths, meals, frequent peri care etc. Mona was the best caretaker we had in a seven yr time with my Mother. Highly recommend her.
